column2: BRIEF-Wabash National Corp Reports Q1 EPS $0.35 May 1 (Reuters) - Wabash National Corp: * ORATION ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS; INCREASES FULL-YEAR 2018 GUIDANCE ON CONTINUED STRONG DEMAND * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.33 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * INCREASES FULL-YEAR 2018 GUIDANCE FOR NEW TRAILER SHIPMENTS TO 58,000 TO 62,000 TRAILERS * WABASH NATIONAL - INCREASES FY2018 GUIDANCE FOR GAAP AND NON-GAAP EPS TO $2.01 TO $2.13/DILUTED SHARE AND $1.94 TO $2.06/DILUTED SHARE, RESPECTIVELY * TRAILER ORDERS RECEIVED DURING QUARTER WITHIN OUR COMMERCIAL TRAILER SEGMENT REMAINED STRONG Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
